intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description: We are a group of people experienced in creating websites using VueJS, WordPress, CodeIgniter, React Native, and web builder such as Wix or Webflow.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For project collaboration, please feel free to reach me out by email at:

hire.title: Hire Us
hire.description: Tell us about your project by filling out our web development Project Inquiry Form, by clicking this button

data.title: Microsite for digital campaign
data.description: We build a small, focused website dedicated to a specific marketing or promotional purpose. It's ideal for short-term campaigns, product launches, events or promotions.

data.title: WordPress theme development
data.description: We create customized designs and layouts for WordPress websites. It's ideal for company profile, blogs, educational websites, magazines/news websites.

data.title: Development from web builder
data.description: If you prefer hassle-free website maintenance without worrying about managing servers and databases, this service is perfect for you. It's ideal for small bussiness, personal blogs, restaurant/cafe, non profit websites.

data.title: Web application development
data.description: We create tools or services on the web platform based on your needs. It's ideal for online shop, online booking platform, inventory management tools.

flow.title: How We Work
flow.intro: In general, here is our development workflow

data.title: Getting brief from client
data.description: Clients share project details and requirements.

data.title: Task Breakdown
data.description: The project is divided into clear tasks and features.

data.title: Start Development (Phase 1)
data.description: Tasks are assigned into sprints and executed based on priorities.

data.title: Minimum Viable Product (MVP)
data.description: An MVP is created, focusing on essential features.

data.title: Start Development (Phase 2)
data.description: We are doing improvements based on client feedback.

data.title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
data.description: The product is tested internally and by the client.

data.title: Deployed to Production
data.description: Once the client approves, the website is deployed to production.
